title: Project Vlad
creator_credit: Luke Dunn Gielmuda, Aaron Rogers and AFTRS
brief_description: This subtle animation is about the chimpanzee, Vlad, who is sent into space during the Cold War. With the dismantling of the Soviet Union he is doomed to wander space as a silent witness to the cruelty and folly of superpower supremacy.
creator_credit_for_label: Luke Dunn Gielmuda, Aaron Rogers and AFTRS
